0.text: Innate - Four Stances: Udyr has no ultimate ability and instead has 4 basic abilities. Each ability grants a Stance: a unique passive effect that lasts until casting a different ability. Switching Stances will prevent his previous Stance from triggering any more on-hit effects, and incur a  1.5-second global cooldown on his other abilities.
0.html: Innate - Four Stances: Udyr has no ultimate ability and instead has 4 basic abilities. Each ability grants a Stance: a unique passive effect that lasts until casting a different ability. Switching Stances will prevent his previous Stance from triggering any more on-hit effects, and incur a  1.5-second global cooldown on his other abilities.
markedPassages: 1.5-second

1.text: Starting at level 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.
1.html: Starting at level 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.

2.text: Innate: Udyr's ability casts generate a stack of Monkey's Agility for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 3 times.Monkey's Agility: For each stack, Udyr gains  5 bonus movement speed and  10% bonus attack speed, up to 15 bonus movement speed and 30% bonus attack speed.
2.html:
Innate: Udyr's ability casts generate a stack of Monkey's Agility for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 3 times.

Monkey's Agility: For each stack, Udyr gains  5 bonus movement speed and  10% bonus attack speed, up to 15 bonus movement speed and 30% bonus attack speed.
markedPassages: 5 bonus movement speed
10% bonus attack speed

0.text: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Tiger. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to inflict Tiger Strike, and also generates a Tiger stack.
0.html: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Tiger. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to inflict Tiger Strike, and also generates a Tiger stack.

1.text: Tiger Strike: The target is dealt bonus physical damage every 0.5 seconds over 2 seconds. Leftover damage is dealt instantly upon subsequent infliction.
1.html: Tiger Strike: The target is dealt bonus physical damage every 0.5 seconds over 2 seconds. Leftover damage is dealt instantly upon subsequent infliction.

2.text: Active: Udyr gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Tiger stacks.
2.html: Active: Udyr gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Tiger stacks.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

0.text: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Turtle. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to  heal himself for  2% − 4% (based on missing health) of his maximum health, and also generates a Turtle stack. This effect does not trigger if Udyr is at full health.
0.html: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Turtle. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to heal himself for  2% − 4% (based on missing health) of his maximum health, and also generates a Turtle stack. This effect does not trigger if Udyr is at full health.

1.text: Active: Udyr  shields himself for up to 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Turtle stacks.
1.html: Active: Udyr shields himself for up to 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Turtle stacks.
markedPassages: shields

0.text: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks are empowered to have an  uncancellable windup and  stun the target for 1 second. The target is then marked Mauled for 5 seconds, becoming immune to the stun.
0.html: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks are empowered to have an uncancellable windup and stun the target for 1 second. The target is then marked Mauled for 5 seconds, becoming immune to the stun.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
stun

1.text: Active: Udyr gains  bonus movement speed and  ghosting for the next few seconds. During this time, his basic attacks against enemy  champions are empowered to  lunge 50 units toward them, unless they are marked Mauled.
1.html: Active: Udyr gains  bonus movement speed and ghosting for the next few seconds. During this time, his basic attacks against enemy champions are empowered to lunge 50 units toward them, unless they are marked Mauled.

ghosting
champions
lunge

0.text: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Phoenix. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to unleash fire in a cone in front of him that deals magic damage to enemies hit, and also generate a Phoenix stack.
0.html: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Phoenix. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to unleash fire in a cone in front of him that deals magic damage to enemies hit, and also generate a Phoenix stack.

1.text: Active: Udyr creates an aura of pulsing fire for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to nearby enemies. He also instantly generates 3 Phoenix stacks.
1.html: Active: Udyr creates an aura of pulsing fire for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to nearby enemies. He also instantly generates 3 Phoenix stacks.

0.text: Innate - Awakened Spirit: Udyr has no ultimate ability and instead has 4 basic abilities. Each ability grants a Stance that empowers his next two basic attacks and grants an additional effect. Switching Stances will replace the empowered attacks from the previous Stance, and incurs a  1.5-second global cooldown on his other abilities. Periodically, while a Stance is on cooldown, Udyr can recast the ability after 0.25 seconds to enter an Awakened Stance, refreshing the cooldown and the Stance with bonus effects.Awaken is placed on cooldown at the start of the game.
0.html:
Innate - Awakened Spirit: Udyr has no ultimate ability and instead has 4 basic abilities. Each ability grants a Stance that empowers his next two basic attacks and grants an additional effect. Switching Stances will replace the empowered attacks from the previous Stance, and incurs a  1.5-second global cooldown on his other abilities. Periodically, while a Stance is on cooldown, Udyr can recast the ability after 0.25 seconds to enter an Awakened Stance, refreshing the cooldown and the Stance with bonus effects.
Awaken is placed on cooldown at the start of the game.
markedPassages: 1.5-second global cooldown

1.text: Starting at level 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.
1.html: Starting at level 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.

2.text: Innate - Monk Training: After casting an ability, Udyr empowers his next two basic attacks within 4 seconds to gain  30% bonus attack speed and refund 5% of Awaken's total cooldown.
2.html: Innate - Monk Training: After casting an ability, Udyr empowers his next two basic attacks within 4 seconds to gain  30% bonus attack speed and refund 5% of Awaken's total cooldown.
markedPassages: 30% bonus attack speed

1.html: Additionally, Udyr gains bonus attack speed and deals bonus physical damage on-hit for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: on-hit

2.text: Recast - Awaken: Udyr gains an additional 20% − 70% (based on level) bonus attack speed and causes the empowered attacks to strike with lightning 6 times, dealing  magic damage equal to 1.5% − 3% (based on level) (+ 0.6% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health per hit, chaining to up to 3 nearby  visible enemies, and being able to hit the same target multiple times. This is capped at 20 (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP) against  monsters.

This is capped at 20 (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP) against monsters.

0.text: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Storm Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to deal 10 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) bonus magic damage to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Storm Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to deal 10 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) bonus magic damage to nearby enemies.
markedPassages: 10 − 30 (based on level)

1.text: Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies, reduced to 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) against  minions, and  slows them for the remaining duration.
1.html: Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies, reduced to 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) against minions, and slows them for the remaining duration.
markedPassages: minions
slows

2.text: Recast - Awaken: Udyr ends the blizzard if it is active and unleashes a glacial storm for 4 seconds that is able to move on its own. The storm follows the closest nearby  visible target and applies the same effects but deals  bonus magic damage equal to「 1% − 2% (based on level) (+ 0.4375% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health per tick, capped at 10 − 50 (based on level) 」「 8% − 16% (based on level) (+ 3.5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health over the duration, capped at 80 − 400 (based on level) 」against  monsters, and  slows for an additional 10%.

1.text: Additionally, Udyr becomes  ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, which decays to 30% effectiveness over 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Additionally, Udyr becomes ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, which decays to 30% effectiveness over 1.5 seconds.

0.concerningText: Additionally, Udyr becomes  ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, which decays to 30% effectiveness over 1.5 seconds.

1.concerningText: Additionally, Udyr becomes  ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, which decays to 30% effectiveness over 1.5 seconds.

markedPassages: ghosted
bonus movement speed

2.text: Recast - Awaken: Udyr gains an additional 30% − 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed and  immunity to crowd control for 1.5 seconds.
2.html: Recast - Awaken: Udyr gains an additional 30% − 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed and immunity to crowd control for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: 30% − 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed
immunity to crowd control

0.text: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Storm Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to deal 10 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) bonus magic damage to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active - Stance: Udyr enters Storm Stance, empowering his next two basic attacks to deal 10 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) bonus magic damage to nearby enemies.
markedPassages: 10 − 30 (based on level)

1.text: Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies, reduced to 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) against  minions, and  slows them for the remaining duration.
1.html: Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies, reduced to 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) against minions, and slows them for the remaining duration.

0.concerningText: Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies, reduced to 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) against  minions, and  slows them for the remaining duration.

1.concerningText: Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies, reduced to 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) against  minions, and  slows them for the remaining duration.

2.concerningText: Additionally, Udyr summons a blizzard around himself for 4 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies, reduced to 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level) against  minions, and  slows them for the remaining duration.

markedPassages: minions
slows

2.text: Recast - Awaken: Udyr ends the blizzard if it is active and unleashes a glacial storm for 4 seconds that is able to move on its own. The storm follows the closest nearby  visible target and applies the same effects but deals  bonus magic damage equal to「 1% − 2% (based on level) (+ 0.4375% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health per tick, capped at 10 − 50 (based on level) 」「 8% − 16% (based on level) (+ 3.5% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health over the duration, capped at 80 − 400 (based on level) 」against  monsters, and  slows for an additional 10%.

3.text: The unleashed storm grants  sight of its surroundings and prioritizes following the last enemy Udyr has attacked while he is nearby, then enemy  champions, then non-champions, then Udyr.
3.html: The unleashed storm grants sight of its surroundings and prioritizes following the last enemy Udyr has attacked while he is nearby, then enemy champions, then non-champions, then Udyr.
markedPassages: sight
champions

4.text: The slow ends prematurely for enemies that leave the storm.
4.html: The slow ends prematurely for enemies that leave the storm.
possibleConcerningAbilities: The slow ends prematurely for enemies that leave the storm.

0.text: Innate - Four Stances: Udyr has no ultimate ability and instead has 4 basic abilities. Each ability grants a Stance: a unique passive effect that lasts until casting a different ability. Switching Stances will prevent his previous Stance from triggering any more on-hit effects, and incur a  1.5-second global cooldown on his other abilities.
0.html: Innate - Four Stances: Udyr has no ultimate ability and instead has 4 basic abilities. Each ability grants a Stance: a unique passive effect that lasts until casting a different ability. Switching Stances will prevent his previous Stance from triggering any more on-hit effects, and incur a  1.5-second global cooldown on his other abilities.

1.text: Starting at level 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.
1.html: Starting at level 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.

2.text: Innate: Udyr's ability casts generate a stack of Monkey's Agility for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 3 times.Monkey's Agility: For each stack, Udyr gains  5 bonus movement speed and  10% bonus attack speed, up to 15 bonus movement speed and 30% bonus attack speed.
2.html:
Innate: Udyr's ability casts generate a stack of Monkey's Agility for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 3 times.

Monkey's Agility: For each stack, Udyr gains  5 bonus movement speed and  10% bonus attack speed, up to 15 bonus movement speed and 30% bonus attack speed.

0.text: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Tiger. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to inflict Tiger Strike, and also generates a Tiger stack.
0.html: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Tiger. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to inflict Tiger Strike, and also generates a Tiger stack.

1.text: Tiger Strike: The target is dealt bonus physical damage every 0.5 seconds over 2 seconds. Leftover damage is dealt instantly upon subsequent infliction.
1.html: Tiger Strike: The target is dealt bonus physical damage every 0.5 seconds over 2 seconds. Leftover damage is dealt instantly upon subsequent infliction.

2.text: Active: Udyr gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Tiger stacks.
2.html: Active: Udyr gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Tiger stacks.

0.text: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Turtle. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to  heal himself for  2% − 4% (based on missing health) of his maximum health, and also generates a Turtle stack. This effect does not trigger if Udyr is at full health.
0.html: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Turtle. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to heal himself for  2% − 4% (based on missing health) of his maximum health, and also generates a Turtle stack. This effect does not trigger if Udyr is at full health.
markedPassages: 2% − 4% (based on missing health) of his maximum health

1.text: Active: Udyr  shields himself for up to 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Turtle stacks.
1.html: Active: Udyr shields himself for up to 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Turtle stacks.

0.text: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks are empowered to have an  uncancellable windup and  stun the target for 1 second. The target is then marked Mauled for 5 seconds, becoming immune to the stun.
0.html: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks are empowered to have an uncancellable windup and stun the target for 1 second. The target is then marked Mauled for 5 seconds, becoming immune to the stun.

1.text: Active: Udyr gains  bonus movement speed and  ghosting for the next few seconds. During this time, his basic attacks against enemy  champions are empowered to  lunge 50 units toward them, unless they are marked Mauled.
1.html: Active: Udyr gains  bonus movement speed and ghosting for the next few seconds. During this time, his basic attacks against enemy champions are empowered to lunge 50 units toward them, unless they are marked Mauled.

0.text: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Phoenix. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to unleash fire in a cone in front of him that deals magic damage to enemies hit, and also generate a Phoenix stack.
0.html: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Phoenix. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to unleash fire in a cone in front of him that deals magic damage to enemies hit, and also generate a Phoenix stack.

1.text: Active: Udyr creates an aura of pulsing fire for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to nearby enemies. He also instantly generates 3 Phoenix stacks.
